attributes.action: Freeze MP's saleries to show the public that they are in fact working for the people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MP's pay seems to be conducted differently to that of 'The People'.
As 'The People' we should have the right to decide on if MPs deserve a pay rise each year. A freeze on MP's saleries would also show 'The People' that MPs are serious about the future of the nation and not just themselves.
